EmailTemplate.name: webtocasenewtemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback Request on recent Service Experience at <{!Case.Account}>
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Case.Customer_Name__c}, Thank you for doing business with Honeywell and our partners. Please provide feedback on your recent experience with {!Case.Account} for {!Case.Description} for your {!Case.Aircraft_Type__c} Please click on the link below to answer a few short questions on your experience. Your feedback is important in maintaining a quality support network. Take Survey
